Introduction


Shiroma Miru (시로마 미루) is a Japanese singer under Universal Music Japan. She was a member of NMB48's Team M and the leader of Mix Juice. She graduated on August 31, 2021

She was a contestant on Produce 48 where she finished in 20th place.

On July 6 2022, she made her debut solo with the single "Shine Bright".

On May 26, 2023, Miru was confirmed as a constant of Mnet's newest survival show, "Queendom Puzzle". The show began airing on June 13, but Miru was eliminated in the semi-final, her final rank being 17th.
